name: Punch'n & Munch'n
description:
🍕Battle it out in an arena to see who has what it takes to survive the hunger pains!🥕

Controls  Player 1 Player 2 Left A J Right D L Jump Space / Sprint Shift BShove other player (Requires standing close) Q U

Survive by eating as much as you can. Losing? Time to play dirty😈 and shove your opponent off a cliff!⛰️

Created by Waldo, Joseph and Thabiso

waldokilian2/BelowAveragePigeons: What's Popping? (github.com)
